Learning to read Welsh, one Tweet at a time...

Follow @tweetsinwelsh

16
Aug 2020

“Er bod hyn yn teimlo’n hynod ryfeddol i ni i gyd, mewn gwirionedd ni ddylai fod oherwydd mae bygythiad pandemig byd-eang wedi bod ar y gofrestr risg … am amser hir iawn. Felly hefyd, gyda llaw, y newid yn yr hinsawdd.” Medd @sophiehowe ar @curve_podcast https://t.co/CinEANeV77

— Future Gen Cymru (@futuregencymru) August 14, 2020

er bod - although

felly hefyd - so, too

gyda llaw - by the way

newid yn yr hinsawdd - climate change

"Although this feels extraordinary to us all, in truth it shouldn't be because the threat of a global pandemic has been on the risk register for a very long time. So too, by the way, is climate change." says @sophiehowe on @curve_podcast

15
Aug 2020

Mae Y Shed yn dathlu ei ben-blwydd cyntaf ddydd Sadwrn
Ac i dathlu, bydd un person lwcus yn derbyn bag o anrhegion gan fusnesau @YShedMeliden
Y cyfan sy'n rhaid i chi ei wneud i ennill yw bod y person cyntaf trwy'r drysau am 9.30am Dydd Sadwrn 15 Awst. Pob lwc! pic.twitter.com/XGzZcSsTQP

— Y Shed (@YShedMeliden) August 12, 2020

rhaid i chi - you’ve got to

y cyfan - all

Y Shed is celebrating its first birthday on Saturday. And to celebrate, one lucky person will receive a bag of gifts from @YShedMeliden businesses. All that you've got to do to win is be the first person through the doors at 9:30 Saturday 15 August. Good Luck!

14
Aug 2020

Mae gweithio o bell wedi dod yn rhan o normal newydd llawer o fusnesau. Dysgwch sut i ddefnyddio offer ar-lein i'w gwneud hi'n haws gyda gweminar 30 munud am ddim #Cyflymubusnesau https://t.co/hVhRuDIQbb pic.twitter.com/tY6DZYL2Sr

— Busnes Cymru De (@BusnesCymruDe) August 13, 2020

gweithio o bell - remote working

wedi dod yn rhan o - has become part of

Remote working has become part of lots of businesses' new normal. Learn how to use on-line tools to make it easier with a free, 30 minute webinar.

13
Aug 2020

Tik Tok oedd thema’r #AwrFawr heddiw gyda’r Uwchradd. Diolch i Ellis Lloyd Jones am ddangos i ni am sut i ddod yn ddylanwadwyr #gwaithieuenctidcymru pic.twitter.com/ZMSAyN1Gw3

— Urdd Gobaith Cymru (@Urdd) August 12, 2020

ddylanwadwyr - influencer

Tik-Tok oedd thema - oedd is the second person singular, imperfect tense of bod/to be and in this sentence translates to ‘was’

Tik Tok was the theme of today with Secondary. Thanks to Ellis Lloyd Jones for showing us how to be an influencer #youthworkwales

12
Aug 2020

Mae mis Awst yma! Gyda Gwyliau’r Haf wedi cyrraedd, peidiwch â phoeni, mae yna lawer o gynnwys Cymraeg a Saesneg ar-lein yn BookTrust Cymru, popeth o sesiynau tynnu llun gyda’ch gilydd, straeon, sesiynau holi ac ateb gydag awduron a llawer, llawer mwy. https://t.co/koXncqzdTI pic.twitter.com/9fkoEBGhVK

— BookTrust Cymru (@BookTrustCymru) August 6, 2020

gwyliau’r haf - summer holidays

peidiwch â phoeni - don’t worry

holi ac ateb - question and answer

August is here! With the summer holidays upon us, don't worry, there is lots of Welsh and English content online at Booktrust Cymru, everything from picture drawing sessions together, stories, question and answer sessions with authors and lots, lots more.
